00092 # else
00093 extern UA_THREAD_LOCAL bool rcu_locked;
00094 # define UA_RCU_LOCK() do {     \
00095         assert(!rcu_locked);    \
00096         rcu_locked = UA_TRUE;   \
00097         rcu_read_lock(); } while(0)
00098 # define UA_RCU_UNLOCK() do { \
00099         assert(rcu_locked);   \
00100         rcu_locked = UA_FALSE;    \
00101         rcu_read_lock(); } while(0)
00102 # endif
